name: Software Development Intern - Big Data Platforms
description:
- Working on developing metadata applications using python and MySQL using MySQL connectors to obtain metadata from databases and provide this to Walmart internally for monitoring and analytics. 
- The application is to be used upon petabytes of data that Walmart globally generates.

name: Research Intern - Quantum Computing
description:
- We explored the systems to migrate the current Public Key Infrastructure to become "Quantum Safe" (example CQC). For this, we studied the [liboqs](https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs) project for hybrid key encryption of openSSH, and BB84 protocol. 
- There is also an implementation of Quantum Medical Image Encryption that I worked on.
